bibl.title: with contributions by Alan J. CLAPHAM, Mennat-Allah EL-DORRY and Alison GASCOIGNE, North Kharga Oasis Survey 2004 Preliminary Report: Ain el-Tarakwa, Ain el-Dabashiya and Darb Ain Amur. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: North Kharga Oasis Survey, 2004. The goals are to document, map, and plan the antiquities in the oasis north of Kharga town and the areas to the west.
bibl.seg: IKRAM Salima and Corinna ROSSI, with contributions by Alan J. CLAPHAM, Mennat-Allah EL-DORRY and Alison GASCOIGNE, North Kharga Oasis Survey 2004 Preliminary Report: Ain el-Tarakwa, Ain el-Dabashiya and Darb Ain Amur. Avec résumé en anglais.
